eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
  L_{GN} &=& h^{TT~\mu \nu}[M^3  (\partial_y^2 - p^2 ) - 
M_{Pl}^2 p^2 \delta (y) ] h_{\mu \nu}^{TT}
\nonumber \\
&+& 2M^3 u^\mu p^2 \partial_y^2 u_\mu
\nonumber \\
 &+& 3[M^3  \phi p^2 \partial_y^2 v +  
M^3 \phi \partial_y^2 \phi
 - \frac{M^3}{2} \phi p^2 \phi - \frac{M_{Pl}^2}{2} \delta (y) 
\phi p^2 \phi]
\label{L}
\
